name: Saturday Night is the Loneliest Night of the Week II
summary: After being sucked unwillingly into a vortex Jilly's adventure continues! Dropped unceremoniously onto an alien planet she makes her escape into the unknown. Who knows, maybe you'll make a new friend! A short point-and-click adventure game with EGA graphics with over 500 frames of animation. That's, like, maybe a minute! Made in two weeks for the $106 Adventure Game Challenge.
